website_summaries.verdict: A decent mid-price stove that puts out almost 10,000 BTU and comes with both safety features and a piezoelectric ignition system.
pros: Has an adjustable heat range, a piezoelectric ignition system, and an inline regulator with pressure-sensing shutoff for safety
cons: The case works, but is on the cheap side
Some buyers say this option arrived broken, or stopped working within 6 months

customer_reviews.title: Great extra burner
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after attending a cooking class. I have an electric stove but need to use gas for the wok. Staff told me about this stove and how they use it for catering. So in addition to using it for my wok, and as an extra burner, the next time we lose power because of a hurricane, well I can still cook a good meal.
customer_reviews.author: JW Musser

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how much I love this little burner. I use it in the patio mostly for searing meats and frying. keeps the grease smell out of the house. easy to clean and store in the case that's included. it's great if you miss your gas stove. I use it a 2 or three times a week. It would also be great for camping.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good portable stove. It the burner control is amazing and it uses every last drip of the canister and without losing it's power. It's great for outdoor. It also comes with a wind protector that works great.
customer_reviews.author: KCH

customer_reviews.title: This burner is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: This small burner packs a punch! It got my family through a three day loss of power. We had hot food and plenty of hot water for washing. It is easy to operate, portable and dependable. Great for camping or to supplement a grill.
customer_reviews.author: janet

customer_reviews.title: The magnito lighter does not work after the first use!
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's a good stove that has an ample cooking surface for a 9" pan. The heat is evenly dispersed with plenty of BTU's. Cleanup is easy, as well. However, just like some other reviewers mentioned, the magnito feature does not light the burner after the first use. I've been using a manual lighter which is not a big deal, but it is sold with a magnito feature that does not work. Since I saw other reviewers' post complaining about this problem before I purchased, I anticipated it wouldn't work. Just know this before you order in case this is important to you.
customer_reviews.author: Shine Landing Farms

customer_reviews.title: Burner does not Work
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 Burners in July of 2017 for the purpose of using them for any upcoming events. On Dec 31 while hosting a party I was only able to get 1 burner to work. Burner seems to have a kinked supply line.
customer_reviews.author: JCWESTON

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little stove.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little stove. Nice case to keep it in to take with you. Great quality, distribute propane gas evenly thanks to brass burner. Worth every peny.
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: A must have.
customer_reviews.text: great for doing tabletop Japanese cooking. Almost like being in a Japanese restaurant in Japan.
customer_reviews.author: Don Nugent

customer_reviews.title: This is what you want for your Korean BBQ setup
customer_reviews.text: I had to search for the propane bottles, but they last a while. At the end of a three hour meal the can was warmer that I would like, but there were no problems. Korean BBQ with one of the round BBQ surfaces on there was great.
customer_reviews.author: DLC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for oil-free home-cooking while hunkering down
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Cute carry case. Don't forget to get the pot - I recommend a split one so you can have 2 different soups at the same time - as well as the butane canisters.
customer_reviews.author: Lin T

customer_reviews.title: Locking Mechanism Broken
customer_reviews.text: The locking mechanism on this stove is broken. Unfortunately, I bought it several months ago and just opened it to find the locking mechanism is broken and do not think I can return it. My Asian grocer has a sturdier stove for half the cost of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Genalinne

customer_reviews.title: Am I missing something??
customer_reviews.text: This stove just doesn't work, it won't ignite. I'm following the directions exactly. Installing the butane can correctly, but it just won't light. I've tried again and again, (waiting 5 minutes between attempts per the instructions) and it just doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS STOVE IS KIND OF TINNY
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY DON'T KNOW WHAT I WAS EXPECTING FOR THE MONEY, BUT I THINK THIS STOVE IS FLIMSEY I HOPE IT WORKS OK I BOUGHT IT BECAUSE OF THE DESIGN OF THE WIND GUARD TIME WILL TELL
customer_reviews.author: R. Seda-morales

customer_reviews.title: Quality.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several of these tabletop units, & this brand is my favorite. It seems to be a higher quality tool than many others.
customer_reviews.author: Jaan Hjorth

customer_reviews.title: died after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: so the first 3 times i used this it was great, then went to use again and now wont light have tired new cylinder, no good, gets spark just no gas is what it looks like very disapointed
customer_reviews.author: Dale Baker

customer_reviews.title: What up with the regulator?
customer_reviews.text: We bought one two months ago and love it, but on our forth use the gas stopped coming out even with several new canisters. Nothing in the manual has helped correct the failure. Now shipping back for warranty replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Robin E Pavel

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be of good quality
customer_reviews.text: Have not actually used yet. Only made sure it worked & butane containers fit. Purchased to use if electricity goes out--we have electric range.
customer_reviews.author: Nell

customer_reviews.title: It does what its made for.
customer_reviews.text: It works great. Boils my coffee water in less time than any other stove I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Abnonbe

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: A little lightweight and cheaply made compared to ones purchased 15 years ago, but they did the job and worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof2boys

customer_reviews.title: Great little gas burner!
customer_reviews.text: Great little gas burner. We bought it for use during power outage. Seems very well made and works great!
customer_reviews.author: amazonfan

customer_reviews.title: It works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I just Love this gas burner! I use it in the kitchen, I have an electric stove, but rather have gas cooking. I like the color and performance. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Danig

customer_reviews.title: Life saver during power outages.
customer_reviews.text: Used this to boil water and heat soup during power outages.
customer_reviews.author: jillian

customer_reviews.title: Works great. However
customer_reviews.text: Works great. However, must be used outdoors so can't use in bad weather which is when power often goes out in storms.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B. Nicolaysen

customer_reviews.title: Great for cooking on the camping trips
customer_reviews.text: Use it for on the go camping and road trips. Pack up my cooler with some ice and food. Load a pot and pan. And boom we’re cooking on the go. Even comes with a decent case. Butane is sold separately.
customer_reviews.author: Geran A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Choose something else
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy. Can stop working at any moment. Knowing what I know now I would buy something else
customer_reviews.author: Floridian

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: this will be great to have if we lose power or go on a picnic.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy decision
customer_reviews.text: Needed a gas burner for certain dishes and have a glass top stove in my house. Super easy to use. Great heat control.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Starts 1st click out the box
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing right out the box. I did a conversion for LP gas and love it even more. Good against wind
customer_reviews.author: Anton

customer_reviews.title: It was defective I have returned it now waiting for money back
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea about how well it may perform? As it was defective. I am returning it for my money back.
customer_reviews.author: tara

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works good for what I'm doing with it. Only used 1 time but did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Flippingkiller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great grill and love the auto-start. Only complaint, is the case is chintzy.
customer_reviews.author: J. anderson

customer_reviews.title: As expected came on time works great wanted for warming items on picnicking
customer_reviews.text: As expected came on time works great wanted for warming items on picnicking trips
customer_reviews.author: kenneth Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Great to have for emergency backup
customer_reviews.text: I got this for emergency use. Tested it out when I received it. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Barry VonHagel

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product for hurricane preparedness. Did a trial run with it and it is very easy to use, didn't set off any of the smoke alarms which is a huge plus. Will be ready when power loss occurs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good but watch fir damage.
customer_reviews.text: It works fine but the item was damaged and bent. They had to send another one to replace it. The new one was also damaged in the same way but only a little so I was able to get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & works extremely well.
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy the product. Light, easy to use, compact, & has a nice carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: RE Foster

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Cool. Bought it for emergency use in case of a shortage.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Great stove
customer_reviews.text: Love! Love this stove. We are on a 3 month road trip and stove has lived up to all its promises.
customer_reviews.author: Monika Farrington

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Much better than the last one I had.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Cooks fast!
customer_reviews.text: Like cooking on a restaurant stove. Cooks fast, I don't have to waste propane. I like that the top can be removed for cleaning. Wish it had some kind of clips to hold it on tho. Overall I'm satisfied
customer_reviews.author: keno williams

customer_reviews.title: money saving
customer_reviews.text: I like this because it is lower my electric bill and saving me money.
customer_reviews.author: LISA N WILLIS

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Been using it on our picnics and it delivers each time!
customer_reviews.author: Kimesh Desai

customer_reviews.title: Tired all of the trouble shotting. Nothing works .
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Chef Master butane stove and it doesn't work. Have tried to lite it several times. I hear the gas but it doesn't ignite.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Allen

customer_reviews.title: Igniter doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I just received this stove and it is really nice but the igniter doesn't click or ignite the flame. Have to light with match.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby G Drummond

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little cook top and so easy to use, just pop the fuel in and turn it on for some great cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: cant believe u spend over $60 and u got the item like this.
customer_reviews.text: i opened the package last night and try to used it, but when i looked closer the black part , alot rusty , cant believe u spend over $60 and u got the item like this.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Flimsier than vintage ChefMaster, but seems to function OK.  Update: better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointingly, this is NOT the same quality as the old ChefMaster units. Butane bottle cover will not close securely and pot stabilizer is not as robust as previous model. Overall, it feels flimsy and misaligned. Mitigating factor is that it was inexpensive. It seems to put out a decent amount of heat, but I've not had time to gather quantitative data. (Time to boil, etc.) Update: This stove has held up surprisingly well and it has reliably served on many camping trips. Intense heat from 2.75" diameter burner boils water quickly as long as you cover the pot and it's not windy.
customer_reviews.author: generic consumer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This review is based on my first impression. I'll follow up if any cons appear along the way. PROS: Weight - It's really light but not flimsy. Aesthetics - I bought this for the silver color. It looks much better than my old blue color burner. Flame - It seems to be really strong. I can tell the flame is much stronger than my old 7000 btu burner. CONS: Case - The carrying case is really cheaply made. All in all, it's a great portable burner for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Col J.

customer_reviews.title: great little cooker
customer_reviews.text: love cooking with gas and this helps when house isn't set up for gas
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Chef-Master 90011 Butane Countertop Range / Stove – 10,000 BTU, Portable, with Carry Case, High Performance, with Piezo Ignition, Brass Burner and Safety Stop, (1 Burner)
feature_bullets: This Chef Master 90011 portable, high-performance butane stove is perfect for display cooking and off-site catering. For Indoor Commercial Use, comes with High-Impact Carrying Case. Automatic Piezo Electronic Ignition, with Safety stop to prevent overheating. 10,000 BTU. This stove has a high heat output of 10,000 BTUs with an adjustable heat range from simmer to boil.
PIEZO IGNITION: This butane countertop stove includes a piezo electronic ignition system, which means no more fumbling with matches!
SAFETY STOP: This countertop range even features a safety stop which will shut down the stove if it senses overheating.
BRASS BURNER: The brass burner on this butane stove holds heat well, resists corrosion, and also resists warping or deforming.

In Line Regulator with Pressure-Sensing Shut-Off, Double Wind Guard Reduces Loss of BTU/HR from Breeze or A/C. Heat Transfer Plate Maintains High Heat Output. Boil to Simmer Heat Range. Use Only Butane Marked BF1010 (Not Included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars146 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
